entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
